verses.verse: Now king<WH4428> David<WH1732> was old<WH2204> and stricken<WH935> in years<WH3117>; and they covered<WH3680> him with clothes<WH899>, but he gat no heat<WH3179>.

Wherefore his servants<WH5650> said<WH559> unto him<WH1245>, Let there be sought for my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> a young<WH5291> virgin<WH1330>: and let her stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>, and cherish<WH5532> him<WH7901>; and let her lie in thy bosom<WH2436>, that my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> may get heat<WH2552>.

So they sought<WH1245> for a fair<WH3303> damsel<WH5291> throughout all the borders<WH1366> of Israel<WH3478>, and found<WH4672> Abishag<WH49> the Shunammite<WH7767>, and brought<WH935> her to the king<WH4428>.
And the damsel<WH5291> was very<WH3966> fair<WH3303>; and she cherished<WH5532> the king<WH4428>, and ministered<WH8334> to him<WH4428>; but the king knew her not<WH3045>.

Then Adonijah<WH138> the son<WH1121> of Haggith<WH2294> exalted<WH4984> himself<WH559>, saying, I will be king<WH4427>: and he prepared<WH6213> him chariots<WH7393> and horsemen<WH6571>, and fifty<WH2572> men<WH376> to run<WH7323> before him<WH6440>.

And his father<WH1> had not displeased<WH6087> him at any time<WH3117> in saying<WH559>, Why hast thou done so<WH6213>? and he was also a very<WH3966> goodly<WH2896> man<WH3205>; and he was born after<WH310> Absalom<WH53>.
And he conferred<WH1697> with Joab<WH3097> the son<WH1121> of Zeruiah<WH6870>, and with Abiathar<WH54> the priest<WH3548>: and they following<WH310> Adonijah<WH138> helped him<WH5826>.

But Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077>, and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, and Shimei<WH8096>, and Rei<WH7472>, and the mighty men<WH1368> that belonged to David<WH1732>, were not with Adonijah<WH138>.

And Adonijah<WH138> slew<WH2076> sheep<WH6629> and oxen<WH1241> and fatlings<WH4806> by the stone<WH68> of Zoheleth<WH2120>, which is beside<WH681> En-rogel<WH5883>; and he called<WH7121> all his brethren<WH251>, the king<WH4428>'s sons<WH1121>, and all the men<WH582> of Judah<WH3063>, the king<WH4428>'s servants<WH5650>:
but Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, and Benaiah<WH1141>, and the mighty men<WH1368>, and Solomon<WH8010> his brother<WH251>, he called not<WH7121>.

Then Nathan<WH5416> spake<WH559> unto Bath-sheba<WH1339> the mother<WH517> of Solomon<WH8010>, saying<WH559>, Hast thou not heard<WH8085> that Adonijah<WH138> the son<WH1121> of Haggith<WH2294> doth reign<WH4427>, and David<WH1732> our lord<WH113> knoweth it not<WH3045>?
Now therefore come<WH3212>, let me<WH3289>, I pray thee, give thee counsel, that thou mayest save<WH4422> thine own life<WH5315>, and the life<WH5315> of thy son<WH1121> Solomon<WH8010>.

Go <WH3212> and get thee in<WH935> unto king<WH4428> David<WH1732>, and say<WH559> unto him<WH113>, Didst not thou, my lord, O king<WH4428>, swear<WH7650> unto thy handmaid<WH519>, saying<WH559>, Assuredly<WH3588> Solomon<WH8010> thy son<WH1121> shall reign<WH4427> after<WH310> me<WH3427>, and he shall sit upon my throne<WH3678>? why then doth Adonijah<WH138> reign<WH4427>?
Behold <WH1696>, while thou yet talkest there with the king<WH4428>, I also will come in<WH935> after<WH310> thee<WH4390>, and confirm thy words<WH1697>.

And Bath-sheba<WH1339> went in<WH935> unto the king<WH4428> into the chamber<WH2315>: and the king<WH4428> was very<WH3966> old<WH2204>; and Abishag<WH49> the Shunammite<WH7767> was ministering<WH8334> unto the king<WH4428>.
And Bath-sheba<WH1339> bowed<WH6915>, and did obeisance<WH7812> unto the king<WH4428>. And the king<WH4428> said<WH559>, What wouldest thou?

And she said<WH559> unto him<WH113>, My lord, thou swarest<WH7650> by Jehovah<WH3068> thy God<WH430> unto thy handmaid<WH519>, saying<WH8010>, Assuredly Solomon thy son<WH1121> shall reign<WH4427> after<WH310> me<WH3427>, and he shall sit upon my throne<WH3678>.
And now<WH138>, behold, Adonijah reigneth<WH4427>; and thou<WH113>, my lord the king<WH4428>, knowest it not<WH3045>:

and he hath slain<WH2076> oxen<WH7794> and fatlings<WH4806> and sheep<WH6629> in abundance<WH7230>, and hath called<WH7121> all the sons<WH1121> of the king<WH4428>, and Abiathar<WH54> the priest<WH3548>, and Joab<WH3097> the captain<WH8269> of the host<WH6635>; but Solomon<WH8010> thy servant<WH5650> hath he not called<WH7121>.

And thou<WH113>, my lord the king<WH4428>, the eyes<WH5869> of all Israel<WH3478> are upon thee<WH5046>, that thou shouldest tell them who shall sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> after him<WH310>.
Otherwise it will come to pass<WH113>, when my lord the king<WH4428> shall sleep<WH7901> with his fathers<WH1>, that I and my son<WH1121> Solomon<WH8010> shall be counted offenders<WH2400>.
And <WH1696>, lo, while she yet talked with the king<WH4428>, Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030> came in<WH935>.

And they told<WH5046> the king<WH4428>, saying<WH559>, Behold<WH5416>, Nathan the prophet<WH5030>. And when he was come in<WH935> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>, he bowed<WH7812> himself before the king<WH4428> with his face<WH639> to the ground<WH776>.
And Nathan<WH5416> said<WH559>, My lord<WH113>, O king<WH4428>, hast thou said<WH559>, Adonijah<WH138> shall reign<WH4427> after<WH310> me<WH3427>, and he shall sit upon my throne<WH3678>?

For he is gone down<WH3381> this day<WH3117>, and hath slain<WH2076> oxen<WH7794> and fatlings<WH4806> and sheep<WH6629> in abundance<WH7230>, and hath called<WH7121> all the king<WH4428>'s sons<WH1121>, and the captains<WH8269> of the host<WH6635>, and Abiathar<WH54> the priest<WH3548>; and<WH398>, behold, they are eating and drinking<WH8354> before<WH6440> him<WH559>, and say, Long live<WH2421> king<WH4428> Adonijah<WH138>.

But me<WH5650>, even me thy servant, and Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077>, and thy servant<WH5650> Solomon<WH8010>, hath he not called<WH7121>.

Is this thing<WH1697> done<WH1961> by my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428>, and thou hast not showed<WH3045> unto thy servants<WH5650> who should sit<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428> after him<WH310>?

Then king<WH4428> David<WH1732> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559>, Call<WH7121> to me Bath-sheba<WH1339>. And she came<WH935> into the king<WH4428>'s presence<WH6440>, and stood<WH5975> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>.
And the king<WH4428> sware<WH7650>, and said<WH559>, As Jehovah<WH3068> liveth<WH2416>, who hath redeemed<WH6299> my soul<WH5315> out of all adversity<WH6869>,

verily as I sware<WH7650> unto thee by Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Assuredly Solomon<WH8010> thy son<WH1121> shall reign<WH4427> after<WH310> me<WH3427>, and he shall sit upon my throne<WH3678> in my stead<WH6213>; verily so will I do this day<WH3117>.

Then Bath-sheba<WH1339> bowed<WH6915> with her face<WH639> to the earth<WH776>, and did obeisance<WH7812> to the king<WH4428>, and said<WH559>, Let my lord<WH113> king<WH4428> David<WH1732> live<WH2421> for ever<WH5769>.

And king<WH4428> David<WH1732> said<WH559>, Call<WH7121> to me Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077>. And they came<WH935> before<WH6440> the king<WH4428>.

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto them<WH3947>, Take with you the servants<WH5650> of your lord<WH113>, and cause Solomon<WH8010> my son<WH1121> to ride<WH7392> upon mine own mule<WH6506>, and bring him down<WH3381> to Gihon<WH1521>:

and let Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548> and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030> anoint<WH4886> him there king<WH4428> over Israel<WH3478>; and blow<WH8628> ye the trumpet<WH7782>, and say<WH559>, Long live<WH2421> king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>.

Then ye shall come up<WH5927> after<WH310> him<WH935>, and he shall come and sit<WH3427> upon my throne<WH3678>; for he shall be king<WH4427> in my stead<WH6680>; and I have appointed him to be prince<WH5057> over Israel<WH3478> and over Judah<WH3063>.

And Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077> answered<WH6030> the king<WH4428>, and said<WH559>, Amen<WH543>: Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of my lord<WH113> the king<WH4428>, say so too<WH559>.

As Jehovah<WH3068> hath been with my lord<WH3068> the king<WH4428>, even so be he with Solomon<WH8010>, and make<WH1431> his throne<WH3678> greater<WH1431> than the throne<WH3678> of my lord<WH113> king<WH4428> David<WH1732>.

So Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077>, and the Cherethites<WH3774> and the Pelethites<WH6432>, went down<WH3381>, and caused Solomon<WH8010> to ride<WH7392> upon king<WH4428> David<WH1732>'s mule<WH6506>, and brought<WH3212> him to Gihon<WH1521>.

And Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548> took<WH3947> the horn<WH7161> of oil<WH8081> out of the Tent<WH168>, and anointed<WH4886> Solomon<WH8010>. And they blew<WH8628> the trumpet<WH7782>; and all the people<WH5971> said<WH559>, Long live<WH2421> king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>.

And all the people<WH5971> came up<WH5927> after<WH310> him<WH5971>, and the people piped<WH2490> with pipes<WH2485>, and rejoiced<WH8056> with great<WH1419> joy<WH8057>, so that the earth<WH776> rent<WH1234> with the sound of them<WH6963>.

And Adonijah<WH138> and all the guests<WH7121> that were with him heard<WH8085> it as they had made an end<WH3615> of eating<WH398>. And when Joab<WH3097> heard<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, he said<WH559>, Wherefore is this noise<WH6963> of the city<WH7151> being in an uproar<WH1993>?

While he yet spake<WH1696>, behold<WH3129>, Jonathan the son<WH1121> of Abiathar<WH54> the priest<WH3548> came<WH935>: and Adonijah<WH138> said<WH559>, Come<WH935> in<WH935>; for thou art a worthy man<WH376>, and bringest<WH1319> good<WH2896> tidings<WH1319>.
And Jonathan<WH3129> answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to Adonijah<WH138>, Verily<WH61> our lord<WH113> king<WH4428> David<WH1732> hath made Solomon<WH8010> king<WH4427>:

and the king<WH4428> hath sent<WH7971> with him Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548>, and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030>, and Benaiah<WH1141> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiada<WH3077>, and the Cherethites<WH3774> and the Pelethites<WH6432>; and they have caused him to ride<WH7392> upon the king<WH4428>'s mule<WH6506>;

and Zadok<WH6659> the priest<WH3548> and Nathan<WH5416> the prophet<WH5030> have anointed<WH4886> him king<WH4428> in Gihon<WH1521>; and they are come up<WH5927> from thence rejoicing<WH8056>, so that the city<WH7151> rang again<WH1949>. This is the noise<WH6963> that ye have heard<WH8085>.
And also Solomon<WH8010> sitteth<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of the kingdom<WH4410>.

And moreover the king<WH4428>'s servants<WH5650> came<WH935> to bless<WH1288> our lord<WH113> king<WH4428> David<WH1732>, saying<WH559>, Thy God<WH430> make the name<WH8034> of Solomon<WH8010> better<WH3190> than thy name<WH8034>, and make<WH1431> his throne<WH3678> greater<WH1431> than thy throne<WH3678>: and the king<WH4428> bowed<WH7812> himself upon the bed<WH4904>.

And also thus said<WH559> the king<WH4428>, Blessed<WH1288> be Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, who hath given<WH5414> one to sit<WH3427> on my throne<WH3678> this day<WH3117>, mine eyes<WH5869> even seeing it<WH7200>.
And all the guests<WH7121> of Adonijah<WH138> were afraid<WH2729>, and rose up<WH6965>, and went<WH3212> every man<WH376> his way<WH1870>.
And Adonijah<WH138> feared<WH3372> because<WH6440> of Solomon<WH8010>; and he arose<WH6965>, and went<WH3212>, and caught hold<WH2388> on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196>.

And it was told<WH5046> Solomon<WH8010>, saying<WH559>, Behold<WH138>, Adonijah feareth<WH3372> king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>; for<WH270>, lo, he hath laid hold on the horns<WH7161> of the altar<WH4196>, saying<WH559>, Let king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> swear<WH7650> unto me first<WH3117> that he will not slay<WH4191> his servant<WH5650> with the sword<WH2719>.

And Solomon<WH8010> said<WH559>, If he shall show himself a worthy<WH2428> man<WH1121>, there shall not a hair<WH8185> of him fall<WH5307> to the earth<WH776>; but if wickedness<WH7451> be found<WH4672> in him<WH4191>, he shall die.

So king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010> sent<WH7971>, and they brought him down<WH3381> from the altar<WH4196>. And he came<WH935> and did obeisance<WH7812> to king<WH4428> Solomon<WH8010>; and Solomon<WH8010> said<WH559> unto him<WH3212>, Go to thy house<WH1004>.
